description: Conference Calendar — annual schedule of conferences likely to produce structural AI findings. Use this to plan research sweeps. Updated yearly. Scan conferences within 1-2 weeks of occurrence for maximum coverage.
notes: Conferences are ordered by typical date within the year. 'scannedIn' tracks which research sessions covered this conference. Set to null if not yet scanned.

conferences.name: CES (Consumer Electronics Show)
conferences.relevanceNotes: CEO keynotes from major industrials (Siemens, Panasonic), AI-as-operating-model thesis, McKinsey '25K agents' narrative surfaced here. Jensen Huang keynote is always structural.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Captured via podcast sweep. Jensen keynote, Siemens keynote, McKinsey data. CIO-CEO tension from NRF sidebar.

conferences.name: J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
conferences.relevanceNotes: Biggest healthcare/pharma investor conference. 500+ companies, 8,000 attendees. CEOs make on-the-record AI strategy statements for Wall Street. Lilly-NVIDIA $1B lab announced here in 2026. Anthropic Claude for Healthcare launched here.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Deep scan agent launched Feb 12. Key findings: Lilly-NVIDIA $1B co-innovation lab, Anthropic Claude for Healthcare, MGB integrations, Waystar agentic AI.

conferences.name: NRF (National Retail Federation) Big Show
conferences.relevanceNotes: Retail AI adoption data. 68% retailers planning agentic AI (2026). CIO-CEO governance tension surfaced here. Useful for retail specimens.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Captured via podcast sweep. CIO-CEO tension, 68% agentic AI stat.

conferences.name: World Economic Forum (Davos)
conferences.relevanceNotes: CEO-level AI strategy statements, macro workforce data. 'Org design is the bottleneck' and 'human in the lead not in the loop' surfaced in 2026. More macro than structural but good for purpose claims.

conferences.name: Mobile World Congress (MWC Barcelona)
conferences.relevanceNotes: Telecom-specific but 'AI 4 Enterprise' is a major track. NTT keynote. Relevant for telecom specimens and enterprise AI infrastructure providers.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Not yet occurred. Scan after Mar 5.

conferences.name: HIMSS Global Health Conference
conferences.relevanceNotes: Biggest healthcare IT conference. 600+ sessions. AI governance frameworks, CAIO/CMIO presentations, executive summit. 'Moving from pilots to performance' theme in 2026. Our healthcare specimen gap makes this critical.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Not yet occurred. Scan after Mar 12. HIGH PRIORITY — healthcare is our biggest specimen gap.

conferences.name: SXSW (South by Southwest)
conferences.relevanceNotes: AI is dominant topic but more macro/philosophical than org-structural. 850+ sessions. Useful for cultural signals and workforce narratives, less for specific structural findings.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Not yet occurred. Scan selectively after Mar 18 — look for CEO/founder interviews with structural detail.

conferences.name: NVIDIA GTC
conferences.relevanceNotes: Jensen keynote triggers enterprise AI announcements. 'AI Factories' infrastructure thesis. Every major cloud/enterprise AI company sends executives. Good for tracking NVIDIA specimen evolution and infrastructure-provider structural patterns.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Not yet occurred. Scan after Mar 19.

conferences.name: Google I/O
conferences.relevanceNotes: Google AI strategy announcements, DeepMind integration updates, enterprise AI products. Critical for google-deepmind and google-ai-infra specimens.

conferences.name: Microsoft Build
conferences.relevanceNotes: Microsoft AI platform strategy, Copilot updates, enterprise AI adoption data. Critical for openai-microsoft specimen.

conferences.name: Apple WWDC
conferences.relevanceNotes: Apple Intelligence updates, AI integration strategy. Apple is our 'weakest hub in any M4' specimen — watch for structural changes.

conferences.name: NVIDIA GTC (Fall/AI Summit)
conferences.relevanceNotes: Smaller than spring GTC but sometimes has enterprise AI announcements.

conferences.name: Stanford HAI Conference / AI Index Report
conferences.typicalDates: April (AI Index report), various workshops year-round
conferences.relevanceNotes: AI Index has workforce and organizational data. Academic rigor useful for our literature connections. Flagged in podcast sweep as gap to fill.
conferences.scanNotes2026: Flagged as gap in podcast sweep. Check when 2026 AI Index drops.
